divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving south on hwy 66 about 3 miles from catoosa city limits when Inoticed some strobe-lights come over the highway I had no clue as to what it wasI asked my wife if she saw that her reply was yes. I was very awh struck becauseof the peculiarity of the object.My wife and I have not talked about it since.the object appeared as 3 sets of triangle lights (very bright whitelights)strobing in a pattern the object appeared to jump from one position toanother extremly fast at one point the object moved behind a hill,then back intoview. I and my wife continued to watch the object until we drove out ofview.Please limit your narrative to 500 words (equivalent to 1 typed page).
Summary: three triangle shaped lights strobing in a patter
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Catoosa
There were no other sightings in Catoosa on or around January 20th 2000
